data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Marusik, Yuri M., Koponen, Seppo (2010): A review of the Holarctic genus Tmeticus Menge, 1868 (Araneae, Linyphiidae), with a description of a new genus. ZooKeys 59: 15-37, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.59.508, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.59.508
